divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving southboung on US 31 and was almost at Sharpsville. West of US 31 I noticed three red lights low in the sky appreaing to hover about 10 to 15 feet above an open cornfield. I could see that they were all connected, attached to a larger, dark triangular shaped object. I wathced it for as far as I could see is as I continued on southbound.
Summary: three red balls of light that were attached to a dark triangular craft
trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around July 18th 2009
